overview: Kayla has been unlucky in love until she stumbles upon likeable Nick. They seem perfect together - except one slight problem…Nick has two "guardians",(only visible to him) an angel and a devil, who don't want the relationship to succeed. Will the sexual passion and chemistry between the two overcome the plotting - and laughable - exploits of the guardians? The Right Amount of Wrong…perfect for the angel and devil in everyone!
tagline: Asa will bring out the devil in you...
title: Right Amount of Wrong
